body:
You check The Book again. [font="res://Assets/Font/InterItalic.ttf"]„Care for the mental development of the child at three months. If the baby still cries, after it has been fed and changed, it is not advisable to comfort it. We would be raising a selfish, spoiled child.“[/font]

Years later, She will use cutout photographs from the Book to make a small game and better understand the pain.  
The child's pain as well as your pain.
